paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: Among the 51 available descriptors, 10 exhibit high pairwise correlation and should therefore be excluded from the model input in this study
instruction: The code computes the Pearson correlation matrix for all 51 features and identifies all feature pairs with correlation greater than 0.9
It then prints the indices of the features classified as highly correlated, which should correspond to 10 features
